description: Schema for Interra site config object
title: Interra Catalog Site Config

___front-page-icon-collection.description: The collection to be used for front page icons
___front-page-icon-collection.Title: Front page icon collection

___testUrl.description: A URL for the test instance.
___testUrl.title: Test URL

___private.description: Private settings that should not be exported publicly with the rest of the config. Used for aws or other credentials.
___private.title: Private settings

___aws.description: Object to hold AWS settings such as secret key and access id
___aws.title: AWS settings

___endpoint.description: The endpoint used to push to docs to. Can be the same as the public search endpoint though would recommend using API Gateway.
___endpoint.title: Endpoint

___fields.descprition: List of fields to include in the search index. Only these fields are part of the search.
___fields.title: Fields

___type.descprition: The type of search the site should use.
___type.title: Search backend

___endpoint.description: The endpoint used for the search. For use with Algolia and ElasticSearch
___endpoint.title: Endpoint

___prodUrl.description: A URL for the production instance.
___prodUrl.title: Production URL

___devdUrl.description: A URL for the development instance. In most cases use http://localhost:3000
___devdUrl.title: Development URL

___front-page-icons.description: The icons to be used for front page icons
___front-page-icons.Title: Front page icons
